Question: By 1981, this person felt he had accomplished all he could creatively with Wings and decided he needed a change.
Hints: MacDonald also praised this person's "coruscating pseudo-Indian" guitar solo on "Good Morning Good Morning".
This person earned his latest UK number one as of 2012[update] with the title track of his LP release that year, "Pipes of Peace".
According to Spitz, Rhone felt that this person had a compulsion to control situations.
